span.style: font-weight: 900; font-family: "Source Sans Pro", sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 102, 78);

p.span: We are excited to release the New London Public Schools A Day In The Life district video, highlighting our talented and diverse student population. This video takes you through a typical magnet school day from the student perspective, starting in Kindergarten and culminating with graduation. Our new video explores each school and pathway to offer a glimpse of A Day In The Life of students from many perspectives at New London Public Schools.

div.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved.
